QuestData.Title: The Ever Drowning
QuestData.Description: Queen Azshara has her eye on us now. We must proceed with caution.$b$bI do not know what she may try but stay close to me. Whatever this threat is we must pass through it if we are to find Sivara.$b$bSpeak with me when you are ready to proceed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort First Arcanist Thalyssra through the Drowned Market.
